channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Leaves covering the roads and footpath for 1 month., 23rd November
item.description:
Lower mildenhall road never gets cleaned properly and we have to deal with the leafy footpath and roads. This has been an ongoing issue for years. We should not be paying the extortionate council tax and have to deal with the dirty streets.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mildenhall Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cnr Hazlemere Road and Glengall Rd, 23rd November
item.description:
Pavement is badly damaged and creates a huge pool of water after rain for days. It makes it difficult for passersby to get by without falling/ getting wet.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glengall Road, London
